Task ID:
\h(《Aika》)This is the Temple of Pyrynn?!!
It's HUGE! I can't believe it! It's the most
amazing thing I've ever seen!\e

\h(《Vyse》)The people of the Old World were able to build
this thing in this heat!? And it's built on
sand, too!!! It's incredible!\e

\h(《Fina》)Deep within this temple lies the Red Crystal.
Be careful, though… According to Silvite lore,
it is guarded by hordes of creatures.\e

\h(《Aika》)Well then, let's get going!
Oh, Bellena? What are you going to do?\e

\h(《Bellena》)I'll be waiting out here.
And besides… I won't be able to help you fight
off monsters in this outfit.\e

\h(《Vyse》)Well, it might be a little rough in there for a
beautiful woman, like yourself…\e

\h(《Aika》)Oh, really… what about me and Fina?!
We're women, too, you know! Just what are you
trying to say?\e

\h(《Aika》)Come on, Fina.
Let's leave macho man behind and get the Crystal
ourselves.\e

\h(《Fina》)Hehehe…
That might be kind of fun. 
We'd probably get it faster without him.\e

\h(《Vyse》)H… hey! Wait a minute!
I didn't mean… \e

\h(《Bellena》)Hehehe… watching the three of you really cheers
me up. You're all such good friends and Vyse is
so funny.\e

\h(《Aika》)Well… I'm sure a beautiful woman like yourself
has got herself a much, Much, MUCH better guy
than… Mr. Foot In His Mouth…\e

\h(《Bellena》)Hahaha!
Sorry… there's no one special in my life
right now…\e

\h(《Bellena》)Well, there is someone that I'm in love with…
But he would never even give me a second look…\e

\h(《Bellena》)But I don't want to talk about it right now.
You should probably get going.
I'll be waiting here. Be careful in there, okay?\e

\h(《Vyse》)Don't worry.
We'll be back before you even notice that we
were gone.\e

\h(《Vyse》)Bellena,
sorry to have kept you waiting so long. 
I hope you weren't too worried about us.\e

\h(《Bellena》)I'm so glad you're alright.
Did you find the Moon Crystal?\e
\h(《Vyse》)Heh, of course we found it! \e

\h(《Bellena》)I knew you could do it!
Um, would it be alright if I took a look at it?\e

\h(《Bellena》)Wow…
So this is one of the legendary Moon Crystals…
It's more beautiful than I ever imagined.\e

\h(《Bellena》)Thank you, so much.
I'm sure that Lord Galcian will be very pleased.\e

\h(《Vyse》)What?!?!
What are you talking about!?!?!\e
\h(《Bellena》)Hahaha… Let me show you.\e

\h(《Vyse》)Bellena…
Who are you?!\e

\h(《Belleza》)Let me reintroduce myself. I am Belleza.
The Fourth Admiral of the Imperial Armada!\e

\h(《Belleza》)I specialize in covert operations. You don't
need to get your hands bloody to win battles.
Sometimes a little trickery goes a long way.\e
\h(《Vyse》)You!!! You tricked us!!!\e
\h(《Fina》)Bellena…?\e
\h(《Fina》)Or… umm… Belleza…\e

\h(《Fina》)So everything that you said…
about your parents…
about war… about your childhood…\e

\h(《Fina》)Was it all a lie? 
Did you just say that to get us to trust you?\e

\h(《Belleza》)I told you the truth. I never said my father was
from Nasr. He was a Valuan soldier and he did
die in battle.\e

\h(《Belleza》)Years later, I too, became a soldier…
I want to put an end to all wars so nobody
has to go through what I went through.\e

\h(《Belleza》)Countries go to war arguing over borders and
resources. If the world was united under one
rule, there would be no more war.\e

\h(《Belleza》)That is why we need the power of the Gigas to
make sure no one opposes us! Valua must rule
the world.\e
\h(《Fina》)Belleza!!! NO, DON'T!!!\e

\h(《Belleza》)Red Gigas, Recumen! As bearer of the Red Moon
Crystal, I command you to awaken and do my
bidding!\e

\h(《Vyse》)Umm… Fina? 
What did she do? 
This is bad, right?\e

\h(《Fina》)Recumen…
No… She can't be…\e
\h(《Belleza》)Good-bye, handsome…\e

\h(《Belleza》)Recumen, I command you! 
Engulf these three in your flames.\e

\h(《Fina》)Vyse!
Aika!
Hurry! We must run!\e
\h(《Vyse》)Fina! What's going on?\e

\h(《Fina》)Belleza… she… she is summoning Recumen,
the Red Gigas!!!\e

\h(《Fina》)She's using the power of the Red Moon Crystal to
awaken him!!!\e

\h(《Vyse》)… She what!?
I guess we are going to have to run!
Aika, Fina… let's get out of here!\e
\h(《Vyse》)Is that…?!\e
\h(《Fina》)Yes, that is the Red Gigas, Recumen.\e

\h(《Aika》)So those weren't statues in front of the Temple,
they were its heads!\e

\h(《Vyse》)It's looking at us…
RUN!!!\e
\h(《Fina》)Aahh!\e
\h(《Vyse》)Fina!\e

\h(《Aika》)Fina, are you alright?
C'mon, we gotta go!\e

\h(《Fina》)I'm sorry…
I tripped…\e
\h(《Vyse》)Aika, Fina! Take cover!\e
\h(《Vyse》)…It missed us… something hit it in the head!!!\e

\h(《Drachma》)I can't leave you three alone, can I?
Stop gawkin' and get on!\e
\h(《Vyse》)Captain!\e

\h(《Aika》)Cap'n!
You came back for us!\e

\h(《Vyse》)Hurry, maybe we can take that thing out in the
Little Jack.\e

\h(ベレナ)「何かピュラミス神殿のザコ戦に
　ついてヒントメッセージを
　言う予定よ。ウフフフ……」\c

\h(《ベレナ》)ここナスルは、赤い月の恵みを
受けた地。赤い月Ж力を持つ
生物が多く住んでいるワ。\e

\h(《ベレナ》)武器の色を紫とかに変えて
ごらんなさい。大きなダメージを
与えることができるはずよ。\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)……開かねえな。
何かしかけがあるのかな？\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)この扉、開かないな……
重くてビクともしないぜ。\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)……ん？
石のスイッチみたいなものが
台座の上についてるな。\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)ふーん……どうやら
水を流すスイッチのようだな。\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)もう溶岩が固まったから
水を流す必要はないな。\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)扉みたいだが……
うーん、開かないな。\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)赤の月晶が置いてあった台座だ。
よくみると、さすがに
こったつくりの台座だな。\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)……何だ、この台は？
表面に、ヘンなくぼみが
あるけど……\c

\h(《どうする？》)「出航する」
「神殿の探索をつづける」\c

\h(《どうする？》)「リトルジャックに帰艦する」
「神殿の探索をつづける」\c

\h(《どうする？》)「デルフィナスに帰艦する」
「神殿の探索をつづける」\c
